description:
Do you maintain a `Rube
Goldberg <https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/92/27/a6/9227a66f6028bd19d418c4fb3a55b379.jpg>`__-like
service? Perhaps it’s highly distributed? Or you recently walked onto a
team with an unfamiliar codebase? Have you noticed your service responds
slower than molasses? This talk will walk you through how to pinpoint
bottlenecks, approaches and tools to make improvements, and make you
seem like the hero! All in a day’s work.

The talk will describe various types of tracing a web service, including
black & white box tracing, tracing distributed systems, as well as
various tools and external services available to measure performance.
I’ll also present a few different rabbit holes to dive into when trying
to improve your service’s performance.
title: Tracing, Fast and Slow: Digging into and improving your web service’s performance
